page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We did a survey of the parents of children in the school to find out the sort of jobs they did. We found there was only a small level of unemployment. Only three fathers were unemployed and we think that the mothers who are unemployed do not want a job outside their home at the moment. We think this, because very few of the mothers of children in the last three years of Primary school did not have a job, but in the first two years of Primary school less than half of the children had a mother in employment. Quite a lot of the mothers had jobs which were part-time, only working mornings or afternoons during school hours, or working in the evenings when there would probably be someone else at home to look after the children.
